item.title: Janos Miko
item.description: Introduction Welcome to my site! Let me introduce myself: I’m János Mikó. I have always loved technology. I work as a Lead DevOps Engineer and Go developer for nearly 10 years. It sounds sentimental, but the “cloud” is where I feel at home. Some Personal Stuff I prefer Everything as Code methodology. When I need to do something twice, I’ll try to automate it. I manage my work and my life using GTD and OKR. I follow stoic philosophy.
